casebody.data:
NATIONSTAR MORTGAGE, L.L.C., Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Maxwell J. BROTHERS, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
Barbara J. Brothers, his Wife, and Mortgage Electronic Registration Systems, Inc., as Nominee for Quicken Loans, Inc., Defendants. C-809 September Term 2017
080082 Supreme Court of New Jersey. April 17, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003327-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
